channel.title: Dumping 508 maps for anyone!
channel.description:
Hi moparscape, I realize some people may want to add 508 maps and objects to their client, so I'm going to take some requests as I finally figured out how to do it. Some maps I cannot do as they are encrypted with XTEA or something, but if I'm able to dump what you've requested, I will certainly upload them for you. So don't be shy to ask!
Maps I know of that cannot be dumped atm: Fist of guthix game room :( dorgeshuun :(
Maps I have dumped, and know can be dumped: Bounty hunter! :D Varrock :D
Please supply me with the coordinates of the places you wish, I will dump only 508 maps, nothing higher.
[b]Note:[/b]You can easily preload these maps by adding them into the "maps" folder (thats generally what it's called)

item.title: Dumping 508 maps for anyone!
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

Hi moparscape, I realize some people may want to add 508 maps and objects to their client, so I’m going to take some requests as I finally figured out how to do it. Some maps I cannot do as they are encrypted with XTEA or something, but if I’m able to dump what you’ve requested, I will certainly upload them for you. So don’t be shy to ask!

Maps I know of that cannot be dumped atm:
Fist of guthix game room
dorgeshuun

Maps I have dumped, and know can be dumped:
Bounty hunter!
Varrock

Please supply me with the coordinates of the places you wish, I will dump only 508 maps, nothing higher.

Note:You can easily preload these maps by adding them into the “maps” folder (thats generally what it’s called)

Read full topic
